message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. Considering its value, I believe a price of $13,000 is a fair starting point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. The product is worth a lot to me, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, but $10,000 is significantly below its true worth. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we settle on $11,500? This feels like a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $11,500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,800? I'm willing to make a slightly larger concession to get this deal done.
